Is there something I am still doing wrong running the program? I am following the way mentioned [here](https://www.fortran90.org/src/rosetta.html#how-to-execute-code-snippets)

You are not doing anything wrong, it is as LFortran said:

> code generation error: Intrinsic 'shape' not implemented yet and compile time value is not available.

Let me know if the message is not clear and if you have any ideas how to improve it. (we simply have not implemented this yet.)
